item.description:
This walk is organized and led by the Blue Hills Adult Walking Club. Their description is as follows: "Moderate walk, 3 miles. Sawcut Notch path to Indian Camp Path and return via Old Furnace Brook Path. Meet at Shea Rink parking lot at 651 Willard Street in Quicny."

Shea Memorial Rink: 651 Willard St Quincy MA 02169 (617) 472-9325 From Route 93: Take Exit 8 (Willard Street). Bear right off exit. Follow approximately 1/2 mile, rink is on right.

The rink is right on the border of the Blue Hills reservation.

The first walk we did with them was an easy 2 miles and we had to head out on our own afterwards to fill up our 2 hour quota, so this should be about right.

Afterwards we can go for lunch at Pho So 1
51 Memorial Pkwy (Cross Street: Route 139)
Randolph, MA 02368
(781) 961-6500


If you need a ride say so on your rsvp, along with what area you live in. If you don't get one that way, I can pick you up at the Forest Hills station at 12:15.
item.name: Blue Hills walk
